gloss: dialoging (with another Zen practitioner to ascertain their level of enlightenment)
signed on behalf of (husband's name) by his wife
(in gagaku or noh) end of a song
demon who obstructs sentient beings from maintaining moral behaviour
intersection owned by neither player at the end of a game
a long time (since the last time)
train that stops at every station
by the skin of one's teeth
being left unattended to (of one's studies, etc.)
